EmailTemplate.name: 2019 Dealer Update #7.2019 Dealer Update #7
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Sales Bulletins Update - January 28, 2019
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Sales Bulletins | January 2019
Promotional Pricing for Display Upgrades on Boeing Business Jets
- This sales bulletin addresses Honeywell’s plan for supporting out-of-production display units by offering a special upgrade price. - Here is Honeywell Sales Bulletin <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-13 Aspire 200 with HDR for Helicopters.pdf]]>2019-24 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-24 Boeing BBJ Phase 3a Display Upgrade.pdf]]>. - Dealers can find 2019 sales bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/uNZ0000I0q0G0Y02600QXt0]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins.
JetWave Satellite Communication System
- This bulletin provides the latest pricing, product updates and STC information. - Here is Honeywell Sales Bulletin <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-13 Aspire 200 with HDR for Helicopters.pdf]]>2019-25 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-25 JetWave Satellite Communication System for Business Aircraft.pdf]]>. - Dealers can find 2019 sales bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/uNZ0000I0q0G0Y02600QXt0]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins.
Trade-in Program for Legacy MCS Satellite Communication Systems
- This sales bulletin announces the 2019 trade-in pricing to convert legacy MCS Satcom systems to MCS-7120. - Here is Honeywell Sales Bulletin <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-13 Aspire 200 with HDR for Helicopters.pdf]]>2019-26 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-26 Legacy MCS Upgrade to MCS7120.pdf]]>. - Dealers can find 2019 sales bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/uNZ0000I0q0G0Y02600QXt0]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins.
Click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]> to sign up for Honeywell Aerospace email communications.
